column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A truck overturned after being hit my a train at 8:15 am on 12 June 2020 in Ta Pong village
column7: aHyundai truck was heading south across the tracks
column8: when the train was approaching. After the incident the train continued its journey.------Local authorities arrived at the location to check the scene and will contact the train operator.
